name: Jingle Balls
description:
Two players compete to stay on the platforms, knock each other off and reach the opposing player's spawn point to score. First to three points wins!

A two-player Christmas themed game I made in a week. Also my first completed 3D game.

There are ten randomized playable levels:

  1. Overpass
  2. Valentine
  3. Snake
  4. Plinko
  5. Jigsaw
  6. TrainTracks
  7. Avalanche
  8. CAROUSEL
  9. ThePit
  10. Secret

Can you find the 10th stage?
